title: Girl born a dude crowned "Miss Portgual," will now compete in "Miss Universe" against another girl born a dude
description:
The patriarchy is having the best year ever in 2023. We live in such a male-dominated world that there are countries where the most attractive women in those countries are born with a penis. Marina Machete beat out a bunch of other Portuguese broads to be crowned Miss Portugal.

The flight attendant boasted on her Instagram account: "Proud to be the first trans woman to compete for the title of Miss Universe Portugal. For years it was not possible for me to participate and today I am proud to be part of this incredible group of finalists."

— (@)

I know what some of you are thinking. "Brodigan, what a glass ceiling-shattering moment!" Not quit
